price: 94. Loba: Soki efandeli ya mokolo ya suka epai na Allah ezali sé mpo na bino moko bato mosusu te, bosenga liwa soki bozali na bosembo.
arabic: قُلۡ إِن كَانَتۡ لَكُمُ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَالِصَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul in kānat lakumu al-dāru al-ākhiratu ʿinda al-lahi khāliṣatan min dūni al-nāsi fatamannawū al-mawta in kuntum ṣādiqīna
